programme.title: The Rise of Charity Witt
programme.desc: S1:E5 Dubbed The Worlds Strongest Barbie, Charity suffered a heart attack when she was only 17 years old, due to being overworked and poor life choices. This health crisis lead her to change her mindset by taking action on changing her life, that put her on a path that lead her to becoming an elite powerlifter, a Strongwoman competitor, a winner of the Titan Games and escaping an abusive relationship.

programme.title: The Rise Of Fredia Gibbs
programme.desc: S1:E6 Fredia Gibbs was the first female African American kickboxing world champion who learned how to fight as a child because she grew up scared and afraid. It wasn’t until she unknowingly got into a van alone after a party with a man who turned out to be a serial killer, that all the years of fighting and training would help her unleash the power she had inside of her and catapult her to new heights.

programme.title: The Rise of Jonny Kim
programme.desc: S1:E3 From the outside, Jonny Kim looks like one of the most ambitious people you’ll ever hear about. A person who can become a Navy SEAL, a doctor and an astronaut all before the age of 40 must be a confident, talented person. However, Jonny didn’t grow up aspiring to be a highly trained soldier-doctor capable of going to outer space. It was only until he experienced one of the darkest, most traumatic things a child could go through, that he discovered a calling way bigger than himself.

programme.title: The Rise Of Damien Rider
programme.desc: S1:E7 Damien Rider was beaten up, thrown against walls, and left all by himself as a child because of an abusive stepfather. After four attempts to end his own life, he decided he needed to deal with his demons by doing the most extreme thing he could do. Discover why Damien felt like he needed to paddle through a deadly ocean and why when he was just about to quit, the entire trajectory of his life would be permanently changed forever.

programme.title: Anna Faris vs. Chris Pratt
programme.desc: S1:E6 If Chris Pratt didn’t have an affair with Jennifer Lawrence, why did he file for divorce From Anna Faris? Chris Pratt and Anna Faris were the famous, ideal couple the world couldn’t get enough of. But when Chris Pratt skyrocketed into superstardom, Anna felt more and more insecure. Then, rumors of Chris having an affair with co-star Jennifer Lawrence emerged. Even though they both deny having an affair, Chris and Annas sudden divorce, fallout of their personal lives, and the health of their son caused a media frenzy that our team got to the bottom of.

programme.title: Katy Perry vs. Russell Brand
programme.desc: S1:E7 Katy Perry is no stranger to toxic relationships. She finally thought she landed the perfect one with bad boy comedian Russell Brand, only for him to divorce her through text message right in the middle of her world tour 2 years later. Our team uncovered the full story of the turbulent aftermath and the journey she went on to become a strong, authentic person who was finally able to fully embrace a healthy relationship.

programme.title: Nicole Kidman vs. Tom Cruise
programme.desc: S1:E9 Was Scientology the reason why Tom Cruise divorced Nicole Kidman? Nicole was obsessed with Tom. She tried to do everything she could to be with the superstar at all times. But Tom had another obsession: Scientology. Then, when Tom Cruise suddenly divorced Nicole, the world she thought she was living in shattered into a million pieces. Was it because of Scientology? Was it the multiple miscarriages she had? Was it the wiretap Tom allegedly put on Nicole? This story was so uncovered, that our team had to dig deep to get the details.

programme.title: Jennifer Aniston vs. Brangelina
programme.desc: S1:E12 For almost 20 years, the media portrayed Jennifer Aniston as a heartbroken woman who would never be happy until she had kids. That couldn’t be further from the truth. Our team uncovered details that will prove Brad and Jennifer were the perfect Hollywood couple everybody adored, until Brad suddenly left Jen for Angelina Jolie. This story is so much bigger than Brangelina.

programme.title: Gwen Stefani vs. Gavin Rossdale
programme.desc: S1:E3 When Gwen Stefani’s happy 20-year relationship with Gavin Rossdale came crashing down, and she started dating Blake Shelton right after the divorce, the media went crazy. Discover the real story of the months of media torture Gwen had to go through, and where she is now in her new relationship with her new man.

programme.title: Chanel Miller Write Your Own Story
programme.desc: As the press called her Emily Doe & his legal team tried to frame her assailant Brock Turner as the "star athletes with everything to lose," Chanel Miller remained anonymous. What pushed her to break her silence during the final days of Turners trial? And how did her powerful statement about her sexual assault give a voice to survivors around the world?

programme.title: Gloria Allred The Fight For Change
programme.desc: One of the most loved and controversial lawyers in the world, Gloria Allred is responsible for putting Harvey Weinstein behind bars… and now, she’s going after Prince Andrew and Ghislaine Maxwell. Why does she get involved in these high profile cases and why is it all so personal for her?

programme.title: Dave Chappelle Tells All
programme.desc: You may love or hate Dave Chappelle, but he did the right thing here. One minute he was the hottest comedian in the country and completely vanished the next. Discover how racism pushed him out of show business and why it’s fuelling his return.

programme.title: Holly K. Dunn: The Railroad Killer’s Lone Survivor
programme.desc: On August 28, 1997, college student Holly Dunn doesn’t know that a date with her boyfriend Christopher Maier would take the darkest turn: Chris and Holly are attacked by the notorious serial killer ‘The Railroad Killer’. What happened that night had to be kept a secret for years, until the start of the trial, where Holly could finally face her attacker, the first time since that deadly night, and ultimately bring him down.

programme.title: Terry Crews My Biggest Regret
programme.desc: For years Terry Crews was terrified of his alcoholic father. Decades later, Terry finally confronts him about his childhood. But why does it become his biggest regret?

programme.title: Kailash Satyarthi Man vs. Mafia
programme.desc: Nobel Peace Prize Winner Kailash Satyarthi has dedicated his life to ending child trafficking in India. Hes freed over 87,000 children from horrific slave-like conditions, but he couldnt save the one person who mattered most...Why does he continue to risk his life to end child labor?

programme.title: The Dark Past Of Funny Man Tyler Perry
programme.desc: Tyler Perry stepped into the limelight with his character, Madea. He played a hilarious, tough-love woman who shared countless lessons on self-esteem, respecting yourself, and staying strong. Behind the scenes though, Tyler lived a life of bitterness and rage. There was one person he couldn’t forgive and it nearly cost him everything.

programme.title: David Goggins The Toughest Man On Earth
programme.desc: Athlete, speaker and soldier David Goggins is known as the toughest man on the planet. Everybody thinks he’s Superman but his internal battle was tearing him apart. In this video, he opens up about a secret he hid from the world and why he feels the need to speak his truth. We hope you enjoy this inspirational short documentary.

programme.title: Surviving A Serial Killer
programme.desc: S1:E2 Lisa McVey did not want to live past 17 years old, and on the day she wrote her goodbye letter, was snatched in the street. For the next 26 hours, it was up to Lisa to outsmart her captor, later identified as serial killer Bobby Joe Long.

programme.title: Katelyn Ohashi For The Perfect 10
programme.desc: Top USA gymnast Katelyn Ohashi was the best gymnast in the world, until she became the target of relentless body shaming from her coach and social media. The elite gymnastics industry is notorious for body shaming, and when coach Valorie Kondos took over at UCLA, Katelyn rebelled against the stereotypes and her revenge went viral.

programme.title: Integrity or Nothing
programme.desc: This is how the worlds biggest music manager, Scooter Braun, climbed out of his rock-bottom to make it to the top. What started as sweat, tears and hustle blossomed into a life of generosity and compassion, all because of one important piece of wisdom from his father.

programme.title: How to Plan for 35 Years of Retirement Spending With Smart Roth Conversions
Why Bonds in a Zero-Rate Market
programme.desc: When you first learn about investing you are told to diversity - to spread out your risk. But if you invested in bonds, certificates of deposit, or put your money in a savings accounts lately you could be losing money. Now and for recent history, the return has been near zero versus 5 historically. So you may be wondering if this advice is out-of-date? More importantly - you may be asking how do I generate income in a zero-rate market?

programme.title: 15 Retirement Activities That Will Keep You Active and Engaged
programme.desc: Retirement is a phase in life that many of us look forward to, but it can be a daunting prospect if youre not sure how to fill your newfound free time. Its not just about the size of your portfolio or your financial preparedness; its also about having a plan for what youll do during your retirement. James explores 15 exciting ideas and activities to help you create a fun and fulfilling retirement.

programme.title: Things to Stop Doing After 60 to Enjoy Retirement
programme.desc: "Retirement isn’t just about saving — it’s about living well. In this episode, we reveal the surprising habits you should stop after age 60 and share lessons from real retirees to help you make the most of your retirement years."

programme.title: UPDATE 2400 Social Security Benefit Increase Possibly Coming For All
programme.desc: The wait is OVER! Here is a glimpse into your Social Security benefits for the year 2024! Marvin Musick from Medicare School goes over the proposed legislation by Bernie Sanders and the White House so you can gain an understanding of how these changes may impact YOUR retirement income! Marvin breaks down the calculations behind Social Security benefits, going over how the proposed adjustments could lead to a $2,400 in monthly benefit increases! Dont miss out on this essential information about your Social Security benefits. Join Marvin Musick in exploring the possibilities for a brighter financial future in retirement.

programme.title: Why Everybody On Medicare Should Have This Plan
programme.desc: "The most overlooked part of Medicare is the Part D plan, especially by those who either dont take medications or have very cheap medications. However, once diagnosed with a serious health condition, many find that Part D will be the most important part of their Medicare coverage."

programme.title: Portfolio Drift Avoiding Capital Gains and a 6M Retirement
programme.desc: "What should you do when the asset allocation of your retirement portfolio drifts? Joe Anderson, CFP and Big Al Clopine, CPA spitball on rebalancing for DJ in St. Louis, today on Your Money, Your Wealth podcast number 530. Plus, Coach Dobber in Minnesota is curious about municipal bonds in a brokerage account, and Daniel in Stevensville, Michigan needs details on emergency funds. Also, can Tim the Enchanter do a Roth conversion and avoid the nasty big pointy teeth of capital gains tax? And, Duke in upstate New York told his wife they need 6 million dollars in retirement, and she said he was silly. What say Joe and Al? Well find out."

programme.title: 10 Big Retirement Regrets to Avoid
programme.desc: "Have you ever heard the term no regrets? Its a good way to live your life. Unfortunately, retirees have plenty of regrets."

programme.title: See How Much This Roth Conversion Strategy Saved Them
programme.desc: Understanding the tangible impact and the critical factors of Roth conversions is essential. James walks us through a client case study to demonstrate how Roth conversions can significantly impact your retirement savings. But is Roth conversion right for you? James considers five critical factors, looking at the case study of David (58) and Lisa (57), who have a substantial net worth, primarily in pre-tax accounts.

Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Classic Finish Details
programme.desc: Learn the details that will make your wardrobe a classic. There are little details that make a garment stand the test of time and they usually involve some sort of detail from the couture world. They are not necessarily difficult or time consuming -- but they show you took that extra step to make your garment a classic. Amy Alan demonstrates serging -- one of those techniques that is always classic. Then, we have another lesson of the Little Black Dress with Angela Wolf and how to use the lining as your facing. Finally, couture expert Susan Khalje has some special finish details for a professional look.

programme.title: Off Our Needles
programme.desc: Hold onto your needles! Tracie and Jodi, are here to dish out fresh fiber inspiration. From project picks to wooly good gossip, things are about to get super knitty… and maybe just a little nutty.

programme.title: Write It Down
programme.desc: When creative ideas pop up, write them down. Make a colorful pocket journal with Jenny Barnett-Rohrs. Candie Cooper shares creative tips for handwriting and Franz Spohn writes with clay. Katie Hacker decorates for fall with a shining pumpkin luminary from blogger Carissa Bonham.

programme.title: The Shape's the Thing
programme.desc: Shape makes the style statement. Designer syndee holt builds style from the bottom up as she creates no-show bezels for polymer clay jewelry. Then, she uses clay to make a seamless custom bail. In her Beading Lesson, Katie Hacker combines suede, chain and beads for a trendy new look.

programme.title: Bead It
programme.desc: Bead it, wear it and love it; designs to make and wear today. Katie creates a spiral bloom bracelet using irregular seed beads flowers and leaves, enjoy a peak at Elizabeth Ward's Czech glass collection, and last learn how to use large hole beads to make wire wrapped focal beads for a necklace with Candie Cooper.

programme.title: Episode 10: Stamping
programme.desc: Make the most of your stamps or create new ones. Julie Fei-Fan Balzer carves her own stamps. May Flaum makes a stamped image pop off the page. Christine Drumheller has a handy gluing tip for clips and charms. Cheryl Boglioli stamps contemporary positive and negative images using gelatin plates.

programme.title: On the Surface
programme.desc: The surface reflects your artistic flair. Lynn Suprock transforms shot gun shells into trendy jewelry. Debbi Simon adds heat to encaustic wax to create special effects. Cat Kerr creates a beautiful pendant with cool resin techniques and Mary Hettsmansperger adds color to copper.

programme.title: The Midnight Quilt Show
programme.desc: Say hello to The Midnight Quilt Show, a series that celebrates late-night stitches, taking shortcuts and sewing in your PJs! Each week, host Angela Walters will bring you a quick and quippy breakdown of a brand new quilt… wine not included.

programme.title: The Four Chaplains: Sacrifice at Sea
programme.desc: A true story of four World War II U.S. Army chaplains who made the ultimate sacrifice so others could live.

programme.title: People Forget, New Haven Remembers
programme.desc: Weaving the memories of four Holocaust survivors and the story of how New Haveners built the first Holocaust Memorial in the US on public soil. A Connecticut story that implores us to never forget and to fight against the danger of hate.

programme.title: Zeni and the Legacy of Japanese-American Baseball
programme.desc: Paying tribute to Kenichi Zenimura, "the Father of Japanese-American Baseball," while uncovering how baseball helped many of the 120,000 Japanese-Americans who were interned during World War II. Hosted by Pat Morita.

programme.title: Charity & Kindness
programme.desc: Hanan Harchol explores Jewish thought on Tzedakah or Charity and Chesed or Kindness, in engaging, thought-provoking animated conversations with his Israeli parents.

programme.title: Family Mediterranean Fever
programme.desc: Sapir College Student Michal Lavi presents the Lavi Family, who live in Sderot next to Gaza in the mid 2000s. Rocket fire, Father's chronic illness, and the youngest son's studying in Norway force the family to cope with a new and unfamiliar reality.

programme.title: Solomon & Solomon Go Fishing
programme.desc: In a last attempt to connect with his son, an Ethiopian Man Solomon takes Junior on a fishing trip to the Dead Sea. As the two descend on their paths, the cultural and personal gaps reveal the absurdities of their lives in the Holy Land.

programme.title: None
programme.desc: ANU - the Museum of the Jewish People in Tel Aviv presents personal, heartfelt stories of several Ethiopian Jews brought to Israel in 1984-1985 as part of Operation Moses.

programme.title: The Lost Planet
programme.desc: A live telecast of Tales of Tomorrow (1951) keeps being broken into by a phantom broadcast of a cheating couple preparing to launch her soused husband out a window. The Tales of Tomorrow (1951) crew scramble to investigate if the caper's real and if so, how can they interrupt the murder already in progress?

programme.title: MAC DADDY & THE LOVERS
programme.desc: Mac Giani (Mac Jay) is a notorious ladies man who takes pleasure in seducing women and making them fall in love. He becomes a legend in the town and is well-skilled in breaking hearts. His skills earn the respect of two friends, who experience the hardships of falling in and out of love and become jaded about finding true love. In a twist of fate, their teacher becomes the student, as Mac unexpectedly falls in love and must confront his dark past to save his dismal future.

programme.title: THE DON OF DONS

programme.title: Guard Liping Conference
programme.desc: In order to study the marching direction of the Red Army, the Central Revolutionary Military Commission ordered Sword of Xingguo to find a meeting place suitable for the Politburo to hold a safe meeting on the way. Ahead of the main force, Sword of Xingguo scouted a temporarily vacant mansion in Liping County and arranged it as the venue. The sword of Xingguo was responsible for the peripheral security mission, successfully shattered the raid plan of the enemy rangers, and ensured the smooth holding of the Politburo meeting. The resolution of the meeting changed the original plan of returning troops to western Hunan, and made a strategic decision to go north to Wu River. In early January 1935, during the Monkey Field Conference of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, the Central Revolutionary Military Commission ordered Sword of Xingguo to go to the Wu River to reconnaissance and seize the ferry. Sword of Xingguo braved the severe cold and rapids to swim across the Wu River at night to investigate the enemys fortress and defense situation, and stole an enemys ferry to return. In the process, Man Zai joined the Sword of Xingguo.

programme.title: Ice cream Song
programme.desc: Hey kids! Sway and listen to popular #nurseryrhymes like count it out #123Song, Easter bunny, rain and many more with our pink diva Emmie the elephant! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats! These rhymes are best during kids playing time!

programme.title: Lamps And Fireworks
programme.desc: Its busy time at home with Diwali evening party , with lots of sweets , fire works and lamps.

programme.title: LetGo
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Talent Show
programme.desc: As Dunky warms up the milk in the morning he hears the “The Great Indian talent show” announcement coming to town. He’s all excited. He goes to his room , gets out his old song record disk - blows off the dust and puts it on the gramophone .

programme.title: Hiccups
programme.desc: A pesky case of the hiccups defies the oddest attempts at curing it – and, in fact, proves more than a little contagious!

programme.title: Shy Tommy Prickles
programme.desc: Mewmew is all set for her party but didn’t have sufficient time to handout the invitations. Deedee and Nino agree to help. They soon invite all of Abra-Dabra, but Tommy Prickles isn’t so keen on attending, because he feels so very shy. But as Deedee doesn’t have any spell to make Tommy’s shyness go away she improvises without magic by making Tommy believe that she has cast a spell on Tommy’s hat. Tommy agrees to attend the party in the guise that the hat he is wearing is now a chatter hat that will help him talk to others at the party. Nino is confused as he’s happy on one side that magic wasn’t used but sad that Tommy thinks magic is used. Tommy Prickles fits right in at the party and has fun playing with the Doobydoos and talks so freely and happily with everyone. Just then a huge gust of wind ruffles everything including Tommy’s hat. Poor sad Tommy feels so shy and helpless that he wants to go back home. But Deedee implores him to stay by trying to make him hopeful that Nino would return soon with Tommy’s hat. Tommy slumps on the ground and won’t budge, not until Deedee gets Tommy to don Tiggy’s baker hat. Tommy jumps springs back up and rounds all the party goers to teach them his very own special Wiggly Worm dance. Just then as they all dance in a bee-line behind Tommy, Nino flies in with Tommy’s hat. A confused Tommy discovers that he was wearing Tiggy’s hat till then and is flabbergasted to know that Deedee didn’t work any magic into the hat all along. Tommy Prickles runs away crying. Tommy reasons with Deedee that all of Abra-Dabra will think of him as silly, but Deedee tells him that if he couldn’t believe her, then to at least believe those who love having him along. Tommy looks up to see all his friends walking up to him doing the Wiggly Worm dance. Tommy takes a brave step and listens to his friends wanting have him back. He joins them just the way he is, without his ‘magic’ hat. Deedee finally agrees with Nino that sometimes no magic is good.

programme.title: Hungabunga
programme.desc: Sneevils evil plant, the hunga bunga, grows out of control and captures the Smighties. Its up to Dude and his fish friends to stop it.

programme.title: MEOW HELP YOU?
programme.desc: It is not a good morning for Sundar as he is messing up the orders. Then a very sophisticated apron clad thin wiry man comes to the shop. Within seconds, he convinces Chai Raja of his efficiency and skill both in and around the kitchen and is instantly employed. Chai Raja is super impressed and the next moment, Sundar is kicked out of the shop. Sundar tears his hair- he has to get rid of the man- but the man despite his suave look is extremely streetwise and fights dirty. Basha meanwhile too finds the man too cunning for his liking when he gets whacked a few times and agrees to team up with Sundar to put him out of commission. Together they manage to reveal the mans actual nature to Chai Raja and the customers and gets him ousted. As for their alliance, that goes out the window the second Sundar is presented back with his towel- the mark of his employment. The two chase and the chai pours as routine.

programme.title: The Grand Unveiling
programme.desc: Nino is busy with his artistic pebble sculptures, just when Charlie comes by to hand over a leaflet announcing the unveiling of Abra-Dabra’s new statue made by Mewmew for Mayor De Pfeffle. Sadly they find out Mewmew is totally undecided as to what he has to create in the first place and time is ticking by. Deedee is all too excited to take a peek to see what Mewmew has finally decided to make but it stopped by Nino. Finally Mewmew asks Deedee to enter the enclosed work-space, but not to see the sculpture which is fully covered, but to help move it to the town square. The sculpture is heavy and tiring that Deedee has a tough time getting it there. Mayor De Pfeffle announces the exhibit to be revealed in a couple of minutes and Mewmew rushes under the covering to add a few finishing touches. Mewmew’s symbolises the theme ‘happiness’ by creating a basket of carrots and proudly brushes it to shine more. But as he is there he overhears his friends whispering about things that make them happy like the magic wand for Deedee, a hammock for Charlie and so on. As none of them see carrots as a sign of happiness, Mewmew is in a hurry to make something that will mean happiness to everybody. Having made it Mewmew requests Deedee to magically get the sculpture to town square in a jiffy. Deedee conjures a swapping spell but it makes both the sculptures disappear. So Deedee and friends decide to pose under the sheet in a manner that resembles the happiness sculpture the closest. Mayor De Pfeffle is getting impatient that he removes the covering to reveal all the friends hugging each other trying to console a sad Mewmew. Mayor De Pfeffle is excited to see a living statue that epitomises happiness in a ‘hug’. The townsfolk take turns to use the statue space to express happiness in their own way, life-size.

programme.title: Mystic Stick Gone Wild
programme.desc: When Pai complains that his stick is just like any other ordinary stick, Negu sends a horde of fake sticks, fans and swords to the Guardians. The weapons come to life and rebel against their supposed masters. April, Xia and especially Pai have to learn to connect with their own weapons to defeat the fake ones.

programme.title: Pizza Mania
programme.desc: Dunky has made pizza and gives one slice to each of them. Cat likes the pizza so much that he do not want to share the balance pizza with Keet.

programme.title: Moles' Wedding
programme.desc: The Mole couple want their daughter to have the above-ground life with sunlight unlike themselves. Therefore, the couple go on a journey to find the husband who will have a joyful life with their daughter above the ground.

programme.title: CHAI-LLENGE
programme.desc: What seems like a normal day turns quite nasty for Chai Raja as he finds an elaborately dressed Japanese) at the steps of his tea shop. He also has a sumo as his assistant. The benign looking Japanese asks for a tea challenge which Chai Raja proudly take up. After all, who can beat Chai Raja?!But the Japanese proves to have some tricks up his sleeve and Chai Rajas reputation may be in danger. The Japanese man shows some stunning tea making skills. Throw into this stressed situation, the impish Basha who finds out that all the commotion just makes it easier for him to lay hands on his favourite banana fries. Chai Raja manages to match the Japanese brew for brew- even the green tea, which Chai Raja matches with his own tulsi and elaichi brew. He even somersaults, skips and even makes tea blindfolded. And he has Sundar as his assistant. The sumo assistant is totally floored by Chai Rajas performance and he applauds, only to get whacked by his boss. But then the irked Japanese presents a tea with the colours of the rainbow. It seems as if Chai Raja is ousted when, Basha chooses the moment to annoy Sundar and the two chase. They accidentally knock over the Japanese mans trunk and out fall not ingredients but readymade teabags...the Japanese man has been cheating while Chai Raja had made his brews from scratch. The Japanese man and his assistant are sent packing minus his dignity while for once Sundar and Basha sit side by side, wolfing down banana fritters served to them as reward by a beaming Chai Raja.

programme.title: Snoring
programme.desc: Granny Peters’ loud snoring winds up keeping Gummy, Harry and Kala awake – and trying whatever schemes they can think of to somehow stop it!

programme.title: Meet Zoonicorn Ene
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Cuppa Chase
programme.desc: Don is pouring HOT TEA into his cup from a kettle.He takes the cup and sits down at the table.OPENS the newspaper and begins to read. But as he raises the cup for a sip, all the tea is gone. Its Don chasing the mice all the way, in hopes to have a peaceful tea break!

programme.title: PAI PROBLEM
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to guard the Magic Fort overnight. Negu sends a mutant that’s a clone of Pai. Pai has to defeat himself using his own self-knowledge.

programme.title: YesYouCan
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: SMART YOGURT
programme.desc: Niya unwittingly falls for Durian Grey’s latest ploy; Dojo infiltrating yoghurt chumplings.

programme.title: Pool Off
programme.desc: Ever seen sharks in a swimming pool? The Rat-a-tat swimming pool has many such surprises including grenades, sharks and weights! Watch Colonel twist and turn to woo a hottie.

programme.title: Day At The Museum
programme.desc: Don and Colonel want a pleasant day at the museum. But there are three surprise visitors – the trio. And as they enter, the museum runs haywire. The mummies come to life, the swords fly around and Don is running for his life. How will this all end???

programme.title: Cricket Match
programme.desc: Keet and Cat decides to play a game of cricket in the backyard with their own set of teams.

programme.title: The Bear and the Honey Jar
programme.desc: Dunky has just scolded Cat from trying to steal the cookies jar ,he then packs the lid on a big honey jar and places it on the kitchen shelf next to the cookie jar and warns Cat from stealing anything. .

programme.title: Check Out Yuk
programme.desc: When Yuk accidentally gets stuck in a book and the book gets checked out of the library, he comes face to face with the dangers of being out in the real world.Will he survive all the twists and turns his journey takes him on? Will he ever make it back to the library in one piece? Will Icky and Yicky have to continue on as a duo? Watch the crazy shenanigans in the episode Yuk Checks Out!

programme.title: BIG BALL OF PUPA
programme.desc: The ninjas investigate the strange phenomenon of objects disappearing from Peelville streets while Seb deals with a fear of bugs.

programme.title: Charlies Castle
programme.desc: It’s Uncle Charlie’s birthday and the twins have surprised him with a nap mask and breakfast, but the twins want to celebrate a little more by throwing a party and inviting all their friends. Although Charlie wishes to have a more peaceful celebration, he gives in to the pleas of Boris and Sandy. After getting a hint from Charlie on how much he loves chess, boris and sandy plan the birthday party around a ‘knights and castles’ theme. The twins get Deedee to bring balloons, a castle cake with turrets from Tiggy and a jousting dance from Mewmew. Boris and Sandy set out to decorate Uncle Charlie’s house, just in time for their friends coming in with all the goodies for the party. They even invent a balloon jousting game between Deedee and Mewmew that makes Mewmew crash into Tiggy’s cake and thereby wreck all the arrangements much to the dismay of the twins. This calls for Deedee’s magic where all the party ingredients are put into a large purple cauldron and it makes a gigantic bouncing castle in the chequerboard garden. And the snoring sounds lead them to find Uncle Charlie napping right inside it. They bounce around Uncle Charlie as much as they can and then wind down for a long snooze. Uncle Charlie awakes to happily find that the twins have organised his most best birthday slumber party ever.

programme.title: Surprise Birthday Mix-Up
programme.desc: Twins, Zip and Zap, compete to out-surprise each other with the best birthday party ever, while Villains diguised as a present sneak in to the castle to steal the Smighty Stones.

programme.title: The Race
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Wild Pitch
programme.desc: It’s an ordinary bat and ordinary balls but the game is sure extraordinary. Watch Colonel battle with cascading red balls, while Don easily triumphs this game until Chottu Mottu and Lambu come up with a plan B.

programme.title: “Cuppa” Chase
programme.desc: Don is pouring HOT TEA into his cup from a kettle.He takes the cup and sits down at the table.OPENS the newspaper and begins to read. But as he raises the cup for a sip, all the tea is gone. Its Don chasing the mice all the way, in hopes to have a peaceful tea break!

programme.title: Paint It Back
programme.desc: Odessa gets angry when her chalk drawing is ruined by a rainstorm. In the Zooniverse, she discovers that all the color has drained away, and she and the Zoonicorns must "paint" the hues back. In the process, she discovers methods to manage her anger and frustration. How to manage anger and frustration in a positive manner.

programme.title: DEEP FRIED PRIDE
programme.desc: After discovering a powerful ancient mask that transforms him in to a (finally) formidable opponent, Mark turns on Durian and decides to pull rank

programme.title: Toothbrush
programme.desc: Be prepared to be brushed off your feet with this entertaining episode

programme.title: Street Cats
programme.desc: Cat is king at GrandPA’s house but out on the street it’s a different story. The “Mean Cats” are a local gang of street cats that always pull a fast one on Cat.

programme.title: Meep Meep Charlie’s
programme.desc: Boris and Sandy are fighting over the water sprayer and drenching Uncle Charlie with it. This leaves Charlie with no choice but to call on Deedee’s magic. Deedee finds a spell to make friendship dust as the perfect solution. Whoever the dust falls on will be best friends with whoever they see first. Happy for getting the magic powder they all set off to see Boris and Sandy. But on the way the Doobydoos rush at them so suddenly that they fall all over them and the Doobydoos become friends of Charlie and carry him off. Nino tries to explain the situation to Deedee, but she is too busy to listen. Back over at Charlie’s, the Doobydoos are treating him as a king and tries to run away from his new friends. Deedee finds some of the missing magic powder but tries to find Charlie. Deedee tries to bring things back to normal with magic, but Nino is against it. They find a way to get the twins to work together and splash the Doobydoos with water and wash off the friendship dust. The twins are friends again even though Deedee’s magic didn’t work as expected.

programme.title: Time stood still
programme.desc: The twins find themselves in a world in which time is stuck: they have to find the original grandfather clock to which the pendulum belongs and fix it.

programme.title: Beach Fight
programme.desc: Its Dunky’s day off as he packs a small basket and heads to the beach .He starts making a sand castle and is very happy with it…

programme.title: Mewmew And The Beanstalk
programme.desc: Mewmew is setting up his garden in such a way to get a Gardening Star from Mayor De Pfeffle. Usually Tiggy wins them every year and he’s optimistic to win it this year as well. As Tiggy says the secret lies in the beans, Mewmew rushes off to freshly plant exactly that from just seeds. But Mewmew is impatient to wait till next year which calls for Deedee’s magic. Deedee puts a spell of ‘grow faster’ on the beans making them sprout soon enough. The next morning Mayor De Pfeffle polishes the Gardening Star to a shining bright sparkle, then sets off to inspect. Deedee and Nino find Mewmew trapped in her house strangled tight by huge beanstalks. The only way to pry her free would be to pluck all the beans off the stalks thanks to Tiggy’s suggestion on what to do. But though Mewmew didn’t have much of a garden, hew friends were able to put up a fabulous rock garden that got Mewmew a special recognition star from Mayor De Pfeffle. Just then Tiggy comes along with his special bean soup, much to the delight of everyone, except Mewmew who is a bit overloaded with seeing so many beans that day.

programme.title: The very good witch
programme.desc: The twins meet a little witch who has no friends because everyone is afraid of her.

programme.title: The Magic Lamp
programme.desc: Gummy finds an old magic lamp – complete with a genie popping out when he chances to rub it. The three pals suddenly have three wishes .

programme.title: The Great Escape
programme.desc: Speed decides its time for an all out assault on the Shadowy Organization. They manage to get the part back, but in the process Speed Sr. is captured. The kids have to save dad and eventually do, but they discover that Speed and Xs mom is Trixie, leader of the Shadowy org.

programme.title: GOOD CROC, BAD CROC!
programme.desc: The Guardians enjoy a baby croc until it grows into an unmanageable mutant sent by Negu. They’ll need to train the croc, and then return it to the island Negu stole it from.

programme.title: Rainy Blues
programme.desc: Relentless rain and a hot cup of black tea, what more could Don ask for. Raindrops at home? As Don and Colonel take different measures to seal the cracks. Cement, tarpaulin sheets and umbrellas! The trio make sure that it isn’t an easy task.

programme.title: Halloween
programme.desc: Gummy, Harry and Kala head off to a scary Halloween costume party – but the winner of the ‘Best Costume’ prize.... isn’t wearing a costume, and is actually a real monster!

programme.title: River of Time
programme.desc: An impatient Pancake must wait a WHOLE DAY to bake a cake with Mama but learns different methods of patience in the Zooniverse, where time keeps slowing down. How to manage waiting and delays with a bit of patience and optimism

programme.title: Clothespin
programme.desc: What can Hepi and Briko make with. Clothes pin? Lets find out!

programme.title: The Vegetarians
programme.desc: We start the episode with Cat holding an upset stomach and at doctors place with Dunky and Keet. The doctor tells him he cannot have non veg and should be on a veg diet.

programme.title: A new nose
programme.desc: The twins use a flashlight to solve a problem for a self-conscious little snowman.

programme.title: Diver Bros
programme.desc: Don and colonel are in a boat getting ready for sea diving. And anything can happen in water. Or else larry charly and marly will make sure that anything would happen. Every single creature in the turns against them and the dogs run for their life.

programme.title: Love Me Not
programme.desc: Don is sitting in the bathtub, smiling. He slips down further and gets comfy as he lies in the tub.He turns over and pulls the cushion around his neck closer. Only, it’s not a cushion. It’s an OCTOPUS!And its in love with Colonel!

programme.title: King ragoo
programme.desc: Ragoo brings the twins a golden marker and they find themselves in a place where all the kids have to obey a kid king’s orders.

programme.title: The show off
programme.desc: the twins meet a lizard and a chameleon who are playing hide and seek. The chameleon prides itself on being the best hide and seek player in the world. By doing so, he wakes up the cranky dinosaur...

programme.title: A Fishy Chase
programme.desc: Something is fishy in the air! Its Don’s new pet, a Goldfish. Charly Marly and Lary are drooling in hopes of feasting it, but not till Don is there to rescue it.

programme.title: The Supreme Law – Simbad
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant, the elf Fo, travel into the story of Sinbad the Sailor, having been called out by PRINCESS ARIBA, the daughter of the GRAND CALIPH. There, they learn that the intrepid sailor has been arrested by the VIZIER, accused of having broken a supreme law: lying to the Grand Caliph, when recounted the stories of his incredible voyages to him. Unless someone does something, SINBAD will be executed in 12 hours’ time. SANDRA and FO must find irrefutable proof that the wonders described by SINBAD are true, while at the same time escaping from the claws of the evil VIZIER.

programme.title: Double Role
programme.desc: ‘Ting tong’ .. Cat opens the door to sees a milk bowl at the door step. He slurps it up and ‘ZAP’ a Cat clone is formed.

programme.title: Rocking Chair
programme.desc: GrandPAs chair has broken and wants Dunky to make a new one. Dunky agrees to make it for him and gets into action in the verandah.

programme.title: School For Princesses – Snow White Case 2
programme.desc: The fairytale detective SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the story of SNOW WHITE, to the home of the seven DWARVES, having been called out by one of these, GRUMPY. When the DWARVES returned from work, they found that SNOW WHITE was not there and there was an opened letter lying on the table. The letter invites SNOW WHITE to enrol at a prestigious school for princesses. SANDRA soon discovers that the letter is the work of the STEPMOTHER and she and FO go to the boarding school, where all the PRINCESSES in the land of fairytales are now living. The STEPMOTHER, who is the headmistress of the school, is jealous of their beauty and has terrible plans for all of them. With their usual ingenuity and a great deal of humour, however, SANDRA and FO will prevent her from putting them into action.

programme.title: Just A Day’s Work
programme.desc: It is just a usual day in Don’s life and everything goes on as usual. The rat trio is at their nasty best. And Don and Colonel are at their wit’s end. With the entire house going wild, it seems our guys can’t imagine a single day without each other.

programme.title: Mission Keet
programme.desc: Cat is frustrated that he can’t catch Keet. As he is shuffling through channels he sees ad on TV of the ‘Super Ace Parrot Catchers’ A quick call gets a snobbish Black suited cat with a briefcase Knocking on the door.

programme.title: Abracadabra
programme.desc: Keet is tired of Cat chasing her all the time. She finds a book in the attic on “Great magic tricks” and soon masters them. now its time to use them.

programme.title: Coco Jumbo
programme.desc: It’s the time of the month when the coconuts from the trees have to be removed to be send the market for sale. GrandPA has entrusted Dunky to do this job.

programme.title: Harvest Attack
programme.desc: Its harvest time and Dunky has given Cat the duty of protecting the fields with a sling and pebbles and Keet is to give him warnings if Hoodie the crow attacks the field with his gang

programme.title: Paint Job
programme.desc: It is makeover time. Paint, brushes, brooms and rollers, they have it all. But the mice want the walls in a shade of red, and Don and Colonel have decided that it has to be blue. To solve the confusion, Colonel cements the mice’s house shut. What would the mice do in return?

programme.title: Boredom Blues
programme.desc: Brains is bored. Fred helps her find something new to do, and she falls in love with tennis! While she’s away, Fred opens a box of what he thinks are toys, but are actually a real army of small alien ships, which fly around attacking the lab. Brains combats them in a tennis racquet battle to the finish.

programme.title: Frozen Smighty Day
programme.desc: The Super Six are enjoying Frozen Smighty Day until Monster Birds threaten Smightyland. Its up to Dude and Melody to work together to get Nardys Freeze Ray back from Sneevils underground lair.

programme.title: The Three Anchors – Cindirella Case 2
programme.desc: The fairytale detective, SANDRA, and her assistant, FO, travel into the story of CINDERELLA, having been called out by her mouse friends. In the story, everything was going as planned until, shortly after CINDERELLA arrived at the palace, the magic was suddenly broken. The horses have turned back into mice and the splendid carriage is once again a vulgar pumpkin. The most mysterious thing of all is that CINDERELLA has disappeared without trace. SANDRA and FO will have to unravel the mystery, find CINDERELLA and restore the magic before midnight.

programme.title: Let's Go Camping~
programme.desc: Friends are camping today. Sitting around the campfire, they decide to grill some sausages. Scot goes to look for them in their hiding place, but theyre not there! Friends believe that Scot is up to his old tricks and has hidden them for himself. They remind him of the last time he hid food... and it turns out that it was the same day the gang met Duda for the first time. Admitting that he wasnt the one eating the snacks he had hidden then, Scot begins to tell his friends what really happened that day. And it looks like a cute little mole that lives underground may have been the unwitting culprit.

programme.title: Follow The Leader
programme.desc: Duda and his friends are in the Pinkar Choir. Duda seems a little deaf, so Dada suggests that he directs instead. On the day of his last rehearsal, before the concert, Duda is waiting for his friends. He goes to find them and tries to get them to come to rehearsal, but they all seem busy with other things. Duda gets upset because no one listens to him. So he tells Scot to be the director. At first, Scot is ecstatic; However, after hearing Duda sing, he begs him to continue directing and even gives him a magic conductors baton. Is the magic baton really magic? And will he make everyone listen to Doubt?

programme.title: You Don’t Say
programme.desc: PANCAKE and ODESSA’S friendship is strained when the young otter unknowingly offends Odessa. In the Zooniverse, Pancake learns a lesson when he and the Zoonicorns picnic in Echo Canyon where hurtful words which turn into irritating little creatures, Words can hurt.

programme.title: A Smighty Fairy Tale
programme.desc: Leila and Zip go on an adventure to find the magical fairies of the forest. Sneevil has used magic to pretend to be a fairy and is looking to destroy them and steal the Earth Stone. With the help of the real forest fairies, the Super Six take back the Stone and save the day.

programme.title: Don In Pain
programme.desc: Don happens to eat a ‘metallic hot dog’ which gave him a bad tooth. Now he wants it removed. Colonel tries everything possible. Even the rats come to offer their ‘help’. But that tooth just refuses to leave his mouth. At last, they are at the dentist’s and it is all funny and hilarious!

programme.title: The Contest
programme.desc: Rich eccentric Grumpy McCrab launches a contest with a huge prize for whoever can go longest without laughing, smiling, singing or dancing. Miraculously, Gummy winds up among the finalists..

programme.title: Colour Chaos
programme.desc: Mayor De Pfeffel can’t decide what colour to paint the town hall as it is so dull and grey. So Deedee offers to help, without magic this time, by getting a town vote as to which colour is liked best. Deedee and Nino go ahead and do just that, asking each and everybody they see in Abra-Dabra and noting their choice of colours. Boris and Sandy are confused so set out to paint and decide, but end up messing up the wall. They seek the help of Deedee, who is all so ready to help. But Nino is scared things will get worse with the powerful magic spell, and with good reason. The spell not only “cleaned” Charlie’s wall but made grey stripes on the walls of every house in Abra-Dabra! Even Tiggy’s yellow house is all grey!! So Deedee and everybody else pitch in and paint every house back to its original colour. So the final building standing is the town hall, but no one has sufficient pain for any one colour. So they finally decide to paint it with every colour they have, like a rainbow!

programme.title: Makeup Whose Mind
programme.desc: When Odessa can’t decide which Zoonicorn stuffy to take with her on a weekend trip, she ends up having a competition in the Zooniverse between the real Zoonicorns to see who to choose. It’s not whether you win or lose, but how you play the game.

programme.title: The Ride Of Their Lifes
programme.desc: Fred and Sir Percival get taken for the ride of their lives when evil aliens disguise their space ship as an amusement park ride. Sir Percival thinks it’s an intense ride, but Fred realizes—it’s real! Agent Brains saves the day.

programme.title: Merry Go Bush
programme.desc: Pancake isn’t taking care of his new pet fish appropriately, even though he’s trying super-hard. When he arrives in the Zoonivese and tries to help Ene take care of a Merry-Go-Bush, he learns to that there’s a right way, and a wrong way, to care for something (by following the rules), no matter the good intentions

programme.title: Por amor
programme.desc: El aburrido matrimonio de Román se termina cuando él se enamora de una modelo webcam en una página de porno.

programme.title: Por amor
programme.desc: ¿Por qué una relación llena de alegría y pasión deja de funcionar? Es lo que se preguntan Bodán y Olesia.

programme.title: Por amor

programme.title: 20 Days

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: SEHMAT
programme.desc: The story centers around a young woman named Sehmat, who is eagerly anticipating her Muklawa, a traditional Punjabi custom that marks the first meeting between a newlywed couple. Sehmat has been in love with her husband Joginder since they were married as children, and she is excited to finally be reunited with him. However, on the day of their Muklawa, Joginder, who is an army man, is called away to fight in a war. The film then follows the emotional journey of Sehmat and Joginder as they navigate the difficulties of their separation and the choices they must make in the face of war. Joginder is torn between his love for Sehmat and his duty to his country, ultimately choosing to put his country first. This decision leaves Sehmat feeling both sad and proud, as she realizes the sacrifice that Joginder has made for his country. Overall, the film appears to explore themes of love, sacrifice, and patriotism, set against the backdrop of a tumultuous and uncertain time in history.

programme.title: little swee'pea (1080)
programme.desc: Popeye takes Swee' Pea to the zoo and spends most of his time rescuing the tot from the various animals

programme.title: The friendly ghost 2
programme.desc: James Dean and Donald Turnupseed, the man whose car killed Dean, meet again for the first time ... at the very same intersection where the accident occurred

programme.title: Fresh Airedale 1945
programme.desc: In his master's eyes, "good old Shep" is the perfect dog, but the cat knows he's really a two-faced mutt who can be bought off with a bone by a burglar, and then take credit for it when the cat chases the crook off. But then Shep becomes obsessed by a newspaper story proclaiming a real canine hero the nation's "No. 1 Dog."

programme.title: Felix Doubles for Darwin- 1924
programme.desc: A famished Felix reads an advertisement telling of a large reward for anyone that can give proof for the theory of evolution. He hurries to South Africa via Transatlantic Cable and interacts with the local animals. He angers a troop of monkeys by telling them why he's there (they're offended he would suggest they could be related to humans) and they chase him back through the cable to America

programme.title: Land of the Lost Jewels 1950
programme.desc: Two children are fishing when they catch a talking fish named Red Lantern. He takes them underwater with him to the Land of the Lost, where missing items can be found again. They meet King Find All, a walrus, and a singing cricket (Hoppy-Go-Lucky) that used to be the girl's pin. He's deemed to be a special jewel (since he's made of emerald) and is brought to the jewel storage room, despite his wishes to be in the Land of the Toys. He runs away from Queen Tiara's guards, but is caught, and when they test him for authenticity they find he is only a fake diamond, after which he is allowed to live in the Land of the Toys after all. The children return to the surface and say goodbye to Red Lantern.

programme.title: Superman Cartoon 1
programme.desc: Superman cartoons 1

programme.title: Superman cartoons 5
programme.desc: Superman cartoons 5

programme.title: The Star of Bethlehem956
programme.desc: A nativity story animated with music performed by the Glyndeboume Festival Chorus.

programme.title: Training Pigeons 1936
programme.desc: Betty Boop is training a flock of pigeons, but one stray leads Pudgy the pup on a precarious chase over the rooftops.

programme.title: Jumpin' Jupiter 1955
programme.desc: Porky and Sylvester's desert campground is sliced away and towed into outer space by a green, bird-like Jupiterian searching for earthly animal life. But Porky remains blissfully unaware, leaving Sylvester to be terrorized by the alien.

programme.title: Broom Stick Bunny 1956
programme.desc: Witch Hazel's claim to be the ugliest witch of all is threatened by a Halloween witch who turns out to be Bugs trick-or-treating.

programme.title: Me Feelins is Hurt 1940
programme.desc: Olive writes a letter to Popeye: she's through with sailors; it's cowboys for her. Popeye immediately sails off to the West, where he finds, who else, Bluto as the head of the ranch where Olive is enthralled. Bluto gives Popeye a wild horse to ride, and, after a few humiliating defeats, Popeye conquers it (and wins back Olive's heart). Bluto punches Popeye out, and into the clutches of what can best be described as a rattlesnake constrictor. Bluto then starts menacing Olive, so Popeye eats his spinach, saves her, and defeats Bluto and his gang.

programme.title: Tokyo Woes-1945
programme.desc: When Tokyo Rose begins spewing her anti-American propaganda over the airwaves, Seaman Hook is inspired to fight back, using War Bonds as literal weapons against her.

programme.title: There's Good Boos Tonight 1948
programme.desc: Casper makes friends with a fox cub. But the new friendship is threatened when a fox hunter and his two hounds come on the scene.

programme.title: The Good Egg 1939
programme.desc: A hen adopts an abandoned egg which hatches into a turtle. The baby turtle becomes the butt of all the real chicks' jokes until danger threatens

programme.title: Tramp, Tramp, Tramp the Boys Are Marching-1924
The Gumby Show: Mysterious Fires 1957
programme.desc: A knight mistakes Gumby for a magician and asks for his help in fighting a set of mysterious fires around the kingdom.

programme.title: Private eye popeye (1080)
programme.desc: Private Eye Popeye gets a call from Olive Oyl to guard a precious gem. But no sooner does he get the gem than the butler takes it (and Olive). The rest of the cartoon is spent chasing the crook to Paris, the Swiss Alps, and North Africa; Popeye always gets there first, but fails to make the arrest until he lucks into some spinach, of course

programme.title: Educated Fish-1937
programme.desc: A rebellious fish refuses to listen to his teacher until he ventures out into the real world and discovers the importance of education.

programme.title: Spooking About Africa 1957
programme.desc: Casper is in an African jungle. He frightens a zebra at a watering hole. Wheezy the elephant has a terrible sneezing problem; he sneezes all the feathers off a peacock and a group of monkeys out of their perches. Casper decides to help, and in the process dislodges the feather that was making the elephant sneeze. But then a fire breaks out, and the elephant is unable to sneeze on command.

programme.title: Superman: The Magnetic Telescope- 1942
programme.desc: When police interfere with a reckless scientist's experiment, it creates a deadly meteor shower only Superman can stop.

programme.title: Boy Meets Dog 1938
programme.desc: A commercial short made for the Bristol-Myers Co. (plugging their toothpaste) that features the characters from the "Reg'lar Fellers" syndicated newspaper comic strip by Gene Byrnes. The plot concerns a boy who has an old grouch for a daddy, runs off, meets a dog and joins a gang of kids. Meanwhile,the old man has a nightmare,where he sees himself as an old sour puss because he doesn't take care of his teeth and gums. He sees an electric sign for Bristol-Myers toothpaste, and that sets him on a more positive course. (The few-seconds of film showing the sign represents the only commercial intrusion in this short)

programme.title: A Date to Skate 1938
programme.desc: Popeye takes Olive roller skating in a rink; she's never skated before, so he has to teach her, and she's not exactly a quick learner. After a while, she ends up outside the rink, and still out of control; she skates through a department store and causes major traffic problems. When she gets stuck on a speeding fire truck, Popeye realizes he'll need his spinach, but he's out fortunately, an audience member tosses him a can.

programme.title: Father's Little Dividend 1951
programme.desc: Shortly after coming to terms with his daughter's marriage, a father faces the prospect of becoming a grandfather

programme.title: Adventures of Ozzie & Harriet 1953: Season 1;Episode 19; Separate Rooms
programme.desc: David and Ricky finally get their own separate rooms - with hilarious results

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show 1963: Season 3; Episode 32;The Big House
programme.desc: When the Mayberry jail is called upon to lodge two hold-up men captured by the state police, Barney finds himself with more than he can handle - especially when "assisted" by ad-hoc deputy Gomer.

programme.title: The Golf Specialist 1930
programme.desc: J. Effingham Bellweather plays golf despite many slapstick setbacks

programme.title: Mabel, Fatty and the Law
programme.desc: In a small city park where strict vigilance is maintained against flirting. Mabel, a young and pretty wife with a bore of a husband innocently amuses herself with the harmless attentions of Fatty. Fatty relishes the situation all the more because this is one of those rare occasions, when he has succeeded in escaping from the jailer-like watchfulness of his wife. Meanwhile, Fatty's wife and Mabel's husband are carrying on a similar game. They are discovered by the police and a sensational arrest ensues. Both couples appear in court, where numerous complications make a reel full of fun.

programme.title: Robin Hood of the Pecos 1941
programme.desc: Roy Rogers stars in Robin Hood of the Pecos, a stirring tale set in the turbulent days after the Civil War. When corrupt officials exploit and oppress Texas ranchers, Roy rises as a champion of the people—fighting injustice with his six-guns and his songs. With the help of Gabby Hayes and heroine Marjorie Reynolds, he takes on the villains to bring peace and fairness back to the frontier. Filled with action, music, and Roy’s trademark charm, this Western delivers justice in true outlaw-hero style.

programme.title: Burn Rate
programme.desc: Join Bryan Baiss and Chris Kelly as they give the Plascencia Alma Fuerte Robustus II a full review. Will it stand up to the hype or burn under pressure?

programme.title: Burn Rate

programme.title: Unrolled
programme.desc: A beloved local institution steeped in tradition. Known for its hand-rolled cigars and authentic Cuban heritage, La Faraona offers a unique glimpse into the craft of cigar making. The episode dives into the shop‚Äôs history, its role in the Ybor community.

programme.title: Burn Rate
programme.desc: On this episode of Burn Rate, host Bryan Baiss is joined by cigar aficionado Marcus Newman to review the Bond Roberts Linea cigar. Together, they discuss its rich flavor profile, smooth draw, and craftsmanship, offering their expert takes on what sets this cigar apart from others in its class.

programme.title: Burn Rate
programme.desc: On this episode of Burn Rate, host Bryan Baiss is joined by cigar enthusiasts Mark and Alex to review the My Father Fonseca cigar. programme.title: Unrolled
programme.desc: This episode visits Cremo Cigar Factory in Miami, showcasing the brand's long history, the intricate cigar-making process by master rollers, and their interactive "Cigar Factory Experience" which allows visitors to learn and hand-roll their own cigars.

programme.title: Behind the Blend
programme.desc: Dayan from Duyos Humidors introduces the first Cuban-made cigar accessories legally imported into the U.S. in 65 years, highlighting their handcrafted humidors made from 100% cedar and other fine woods. He shares his personal connection to cigars through his grandfather's farm in Cuba and discusses the company's future plans, including customization options and collaborations.

programme.title: Burn Rate
programme.desc: On this episode of Burn Rate, host Bryan Baiss is joined by cigar expert Maxwell De Jong to review the renowned Romeo y Julieta cigar. Together, they dive into its flavor, burn, and craftsmanship, sharing their thoughts on how this classic stick holds up in today's market.

programme.title: Dissecting the Kendrick-Drake Battle
programme.desc: The Kendrick-Drake battle was so much that I had to do a whole episode about it. I called some MCs and people who love to deconstruct lyrics and we went deep through all the major songs of the battle. This is the dissection that you need.

programme.title: Give Me Shelter - Film
programme.desc: Celebrities are on a mission to save animals caught in the crosshairs of human arrogance and greed.

programme.title: The Human Experiment
programme.desc: A riveting documentary about chemicals being poured into our lives in various ways.

programme.title: A Prayer For Compassion
programme.desc: An inspirational documentary about the importance of expanding your circle of compassion in life.

programme.title: The Cult of Humpty Dumpty
programme.desc: A group of troubled teen girls and their teacher must fight for survival after discovering a cult has brought Humpty Dumpty, a killer doll, back to life and set loose on the camp where they are staying...

programme.title: Red Summer
programme.desc: Four young people come to Mallorca to enjoy idyllic summer holidays, but delving into the most inhospitable places on the island will begin a hellish journey...

programme.title: Dear Diary
programme.desc: When a psychiatric doctor researches a young girls' diary to find out why she murdered her entire family, he begins to fall into the same state of insomnia and confusion that led her to lose her mind...

programme.title: Doctor Carver
programme.desc: A group of ladies seeking the perfect faces soon realise when they conjure a demonic plastic surgeon, that no surgery comes without a price...

programme.title: Ouija: Reunión Mortal
programme.desc: Sucesos extraños les ocurren a unos amigos antes de una fiesta de cumpleaños en un gran almacén. Dos de ellos encuentran un viejo tablero de espiritismo y deciden contactar con los antiguos inquilinos de la víctima fallecida...

programme.title: El Resurgir de la Momia
programme.desc: Un grupo de estudiantes de arqueología despierta a una momia ancestral. Tras quedar atrapados en un bucle temporal, la única forma de escapar es derrotarla. A medida que aumenta el número de cadáveres, parece que la Momia debe recolectar las almas de quienes la despertaron para poder caminar sobre la tierra, para siempre...

programme.title: Jack y Jill 3
programme.desc: 10 años después de los últimos asesinatos atroces en la colina, Jack y Jill están de regreso para masacrar al elenco y al equipo de un programa de Internet en vivo que busca descubrir los secretos de la leyenda...

programme.title: El Mundo Es Tuyo
programme.desc: El cartel más poderoso ha puesto sus reglas y deben respetarse, la regla principal del patrón es prohibir los secuestros en la plaza. El comandante Ántrax es el encargado de hacer cumplir las órdenes del señor.

programme.title: El Basukazo 2
programme.desc: Después de haber sido dado por muerto, Edgar es rescatado por una bella mujer que trabaja en la mafia, cuando Edgar se recupera de sus heridas se integra al nuevo equipo ya que se necesita un hombre que sea experto en el manejo de las armas.

programme.title: Arareko Amor y Odio
programme.desc: Cuando fueron jóvenes no pudieron realizar su amor, ahora sus hijos vuelven a enamorarse. pero las envidias desatan el odio y la muerte en este bello pueblo llamado Estación Creel.

programme.title: 20,000 Besos
programme.desc: Juan es un treintañero que está aburrido con su vida actual. Hace tiempo que no ve a sus amigos y solo se dedica a trabajar –en un lugar aburrido– y a hacer de novio. Abrumado de rutina, un día se separa "sin rumbo fijo". Luego de pasar unas noches en la casa de su amigo Goldstein, él va comenzando a recuperar todo lo que estaba olvidado. Se alquila un departamento, se reencuentra con sus amigos y cuando comienza a disfrutar de su vida de recién separado, su jefe le asigna un trabajo junto a Luciana, una compañera de la oficina. Lo que al principio parece una tontería se convierte en un tedio. Juan no tolera en nada a Luciana. Pero por esas cosas raras que a veces suceden, Juan comienza a enamorarse de ella. ¿Estará recuperando sus encantos de soltero? ¿O está por cometer el mayor error de su vida sentimental?

Corre el año 2097 que después de 30 años de paz y prosperidad se ha erradicado la letal pandemia del virus del 2067.Pero una sombra se cierne sobre las comunidades de supervivientes. Un espectro que vuelve para atormentar a aquellos que desterraron la causa de la pandemia logrando retornar a la supervivencia necesaria para sobrevivir a pesar de la lección sufrida por la humanidad desde el 2067

En el año 2044, una mutación de la bacteria de la peste trajo la aniquilación a tres cuartas partes de la humanidad. Los que quedan se han organizado en refugios distantes, siempre temiendo el posible contagio. En el exterior, bandas de saqueadores controlan el territorio, haciendo valer las leyes de la supervivencia. Un objeto del pasado, encontrado por accidente, pone en marcha una serie de acontecimientos que ponen en peligro la vida de muchos supervivientes.

programme.title: El Duende
programme.desc: Rosalía se muda a la ciudad junto a su hijo pequeño, Ramiro. Con la ayuda de una conocida, consigue encontrar vivienda. La casa ha estado cerrada por décadas, y tiene un horno antiguo. Lo que Rosalía ignora es que dentro del horno habita un duende que tiene por costumbre robar niños.

programme.title: El Sonido de los Tulipanes
programme.desc: En Buenos Aires durante la crisis del 2001, Marcelo un escritor devenido en periodista, debe volver sobre los últimos pasos de su padre Tonio un consagrado intelectual de quien se encuentra profundamente distanciado cuando muere en condiciones extrañas. De la mano de Carolina la ex secretaria de su padre, Marcelo se sumerge en un mundo oscuro lleno de violencia y ambiciones de poder enfrentándose a “El Loco” Bertolini. Pero el peligro no solo lo acechará a él sino también a los suyos. ¿Podrá Marcelo encontrar los verdaderos motivos de la muerte de su padre?

programme.title: El Retorno
programme.desc: Una extraña mujer mantiene expectante y desorientado al espectador cuando a diario habla con su hija y la presencia de su hija no aparece en ningún momento. Una historia no previsible que juega al despiste, por lo que, hay que esperar hasta el final para saber lo que está pasando la protagonista.

programme.title: God Will Work It In!
programme.desc: Sometimes, even when your situation isn’t getting better, you are. Stop stressing like you need to do it alone and remember that God is with you in it. He’s already given you what you need — and He’ll help you work it in to what you’re facing.

programme.title: Deeper Than You Think
